response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $12,000. This special opportunity allows you to secure this valuable asset at a premium rate, providing you with a significant advantage over others in your field. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your experience. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
